title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, February 10, 2022
description: "Art is not a mirror held up to reality but a hammer with which to shape it." –Bertolt Brecht, poet & playwright born on this day in 1898.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Art is not a mirror held up to reality but a hammer with which to shape it." –Bertolt Brecht, poet & playwright born on this day in 1898.
